content: So, is there a document on customizing some of the UI elements to replace some of the generic "Zulip" logo and text to an organization specific logo/text throughout the server that lasts across upgrades? I know about the organization icon and login description, I'm talking about things like the favicon, the header company name, etc.

@William McVey no guide, though there is an open issue to make replacing the header in the upper left easier.
If you do a rebranding and keep notes on what you did, we'd be happy to clean it up and add it as a guide to our docs!

Updated #7995, which covers the "Zulip" in the upper left. For the login page, we should probably add a server setting to remove the header and footer if we don't have one already.

This is a wonderful app. There are just a couple of changes that would be great: rebranding and user levels. The guest user is about to be released, and that is fantastic. But the regular user does not need to see many things in the setting tab. Anyway, great app!

@6lauber oak You can get developer tools for the desktop app in View -> Toggle DevTools .. There are two sets fof DevTools, one for the entire app, and one for each added organization/tab.
